text: The Royal National Theatre in London, commonly known as the National Theatre (NT), is one of the United Kingdom's three most well known publicly funded performing arts center. It is known as the National Theatre of Great Britain. It was founded by Laurence Olivier. ==References== Category:1970s establishments in England Category:1976 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Theatres in the United Kingdom Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Lambeth
title: Royal National Theatre
